<<<<<<< HEAD
One hundred and ninety sermons on the hundred and nineteenth Psalm preached by the late reverend and learned Thomas Manton, D.D. ; with a perfect alphabetical table directing to the principal matters contained therein. Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677. White, Robert, 1645-1703. Bates, William, 1625-1699.
[5], 1107, [29] p. : port.
Printed for T.P. &c. and are to be sold by Michael Hide, bookseller in Exon, London : 1681.
Includes index. "To the reader" signed: W. Bates. Contains frontispiece portrait of Thomas Manton, signed: R. White, sculpsit. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

[5], 1107, [29] p. : port.
Printed for T.P. &c. and are to be sold by Michael Hide, bookseller in Exon, London : 1681.
Includes index. "To the reader" signed: W. Bates. Contains frontispiece portrait of Thomas Manton, signed: R. White, sculpsit. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
